'''Bouffalant''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''バッフロン''' ''Buffron'') is a {{type|Normal}} {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation V]].

It is not known to [[Evolution|evolve]] into or from any other Pokémon.

==Biology==
Bouffalant is a bovine Pokémon with a large, dark {{wp|afro}} on its head. Two large, curving horns, each with two golden growths resembling rings, protrude from the afro. It has a shaggy brown hide that ends at its knees and does not cover its face. A large, gray nose sits at the end of its short, beige snout, and its yellow eyes are partly hidden by its hair. There are black tear markings directly below its eyes. Each of its beige legs has a single, gray hoof and its tail ends in a stubby tuft of fur. A territorial Pokémon, it will headbutt anyone that attempts to invade its territory. However, in the [[BW066|anime]], it has been known not to attack those with an afro hairstyle. Protected by its afro, which absorbs damage, its headbutts are strong enough to derail a train and send it flying. Bouffalant is the [[signature move|only known Pokémon]] to learn {{m|Head Charge}}.

==In the anime==
[[File:Alder Bouffalant.png|thumb|250px|left|Bouffalant in the {{pkmn|anime}}]]
===Major appearances===
[[Alder]]'s Bouffalant debuted in ''[[BW031|Ash and Trip's Third Battle!]]''. It was shown battling in a flashback of [[Trip]]'s past and inspired him to become a Pokémon Trainer. It returned in ''[[BW052|Ash Versus the Champion!]]'' where it faced {{AP|Pikachu}} in a battle with {{Ash}}. Alder fell asleep during the battle, resulting in no one winning. Alder later used Bouffalant in a battle against Trip and his {{TP|Trip|Serperior}}, and was able to win.

A herd of Bouffalant appeared in ''[[BW066|Baffling the Bouffalant!]]''. They attacked anyone in their territory who wasn't wearing an afro.

===Minor appearances===
A herd of Bouffalant was seen in the prologue of ''[[M14|White—Victini and Zekrom]]''. They were startled by the arrival of a dust storm and began to stampede towards [[Luisa]]'s village. However, the nearby [[Damon]] summoned [[Reshiram (M14)|Reshiram]] to easily destroy the dust storm, thus placating the Bouffalant in time.

A Bouffalant appeared in ''[[BW053|A Maractus Musical!]]'', where it was part of a [[Pokémon Musical]] show alongside an {{p|Elgyem}}.

Multiple Bouffalant appeared in ''[[M15|Kyurem VS. The Sword of Justice]]''.

Multiple Bouffalant appeared in ''[[BW102|Team Eevee and the Pokémon Rescue Squad!]]'', where they were in a ranch in [[Virgil]]'s house.

==Trivia==
* Bouffalant represents {{wp|May}} in the [[Unova]] [[horoscope]].

===Origin===
Bouffalant is based on a {{wp|buffalo}}, particularly an {{wp|American bison}}. However, the horns more closely resemble those of the {{wp|African buffalo}} or ''{{wp|Bison latifrons}}''. The fur on its head resembles an {{wp|afro}}.

====Name origin====
Bouffalant is a combination of ''{{wp|bouffant}}'' and ''buffalo''. It may also involve ''gallant''.

Buffron is a combination of ''buffalo'', ''afro'', and ''bison''.
